1.name: Convex Brightening Serum
1.description: Unveil your skin's true brilliance with Convex Brightening Serum. Infused with a potent blend of Vitamin C and citrus extracts, this serum is designed to lighten dark spots and even out skin tone, ensuring a glowing complexion.
1.tips: Combine with Product 2 for the best results!

2.name: Convex Anti-Aging Serum
2.description: Defy the laws of aging with Convex Anti-Aging Serum. Crafted with powerful antioxidants and skin-replenishing peptides, this rich serum reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
2.tips: Perfect for daily use with Product 3!

3.name: Convex Hydrating Serum
3.description: Drench your skin in moisture with Convex Hydrating Serum. This ultra-hydrating formula is loaded with hyaluronic acid and sea kelp extracts to lock in moisture and deeply hydrate the skin.
3.tips: Ideal for all skin types. Use regularly for best results!

4.name: Convex Gentle Cleansing Foam
4.description: Start your skincare routine with our gentle yet effective cleansing foam. Removes impurities while maintaining skin's natural moisture barrier.
4.tips: Use morning and evening for best results.

5.name: Convex Exfoliating Toner
5.description: A refreshing toner with gentle exfoliating properties. Contains BHA and PHA to remove dead skin cells and unclog pores.
5.tips: Use 2-3 times per week after cleansing.

6.name: Convex Night Repair Cream
6.description: Rich night cream that works while you sleep. Contains retinol and peptides for overnight skin regeneration.
6.tips: Apply as the last step in your evening routine.

7.name: Convex UV Shield SPF 50
7.description: Lightweight, broad-spectrum sunscreen that protects against UVA/UVB rays while providing antioxidant protection.
7.tips: Reapply every 2 hours when exposed to sun.

8.name: Convex Pore Minimizing Mask
8.description: Clay-based mask that deeply cleanses and refines pores. Contains kaolin clay and charcoal powder.
8.tips: Use 1-2 times per week after cleansing.

9.name: Convex Eye Recovery Gel
9.description: Cooling gel that reduces puffiness and dark circles. With caffeine and vitamin K.
9.tips: Gently pat around eye area morning and night.

10.name: Convex Niacinamide Booster
10.description: Concentrated 10% niacinamide serum that controls oil production and improves skin texture.
10.tips: Can be mixed with other serums or moisturizers.

11.name: Convex Hydrating Mist
11.description: Refreshing facial mist with hyaluronic acid and rose water. Perfect for hydration throughout the day.
11.tips: Use anytime skin needs a moisture boost.

12.name: Convex Lip Treatment Balm
12.description: Rich lip balm with shea butter and peptides. Repairs and plumps lips overnight.

13.name: Convex AHA/BHA Peel
13.description: Professional-grade chemical peel with multiple acids for enhanced skin renewal.
13.tips: Use once per week. Avoid combining with other exfoliants.

14.name: Convex Ceramide Moisture Barrier Cream
14.description: Rich cream that repairs and strengthens skin's moisture barrier. Perfect for sensitive skin.
14.tips: Ideal for both day and night use.

15.name: Convex Complete Skincare Set
15.description: Complete skincare routine including cleanser, toner, serum, moisturizer, and sunscreen.
15.tips: Perfect starter kit for skincare beginners!
